exits.description: the grasslands continue to the west.

description: the forest and grasslands meet here. it is rare to see a beast of the forest here, and the beasts of the plains do not prefer the shorter grass.
investigationDescription:
you see no threats. they are more often found east or west of here. 

the vast expanse of these grasslands continue north, but wandering too far from home is dangerous.

exits.description: the grasslands continue to the west.

description: the eye of night has yet to come out and illuminate the ground. the plains are eerie at this time of night.
investigationDescription: your heart beats a little faster as you imagine what might lurk behind the trees or in the patches of taller grass. you see nothing, but something in your mind tells you to leave.

exits.description: the grasslands continue to the west.

description: the bright eye of the night illuminates the grasslands around you. the vastness of the plains stretching north makes you aware of how alone you are.
investigationDescription: your heart beats a little faster as you imagine the beasts that hunt at night. without a companion, nobody would bear witness to your death. you see nothing, but something in your mind tells you to leave.

exits.description: the grasslands continue to the west.

exits.description: the grasslands continue to the west.

description: this is the wrong direction, the beast is to the east.
investigationDescription: you do not feel compelled to look around, it is time for the hunt.

exits.description: the grasslands continue to the west.

description: the forest and grasslands meet here. it is rare to see a beast of the forest here, and the beasts of the plains do not prefer the shorter grass.
investigationDescription:
you don't have the energy to look around and carry the carcass. you should head home. 

the vast expanse of these grasslands continue north, but wandering too far from home is dangerous.

exits.description: the grasslands continue to the west.

description: the grasslands around you are dark. hard to see, easy to lose your way.
investigationDescription: there is no time to look around, you must find Tei.

description: a restless wind blows across the plain. it sends a chill across your skin.
investigationDescription: there are no signs that Nua and Onah were here.

exits.description: the grasslands continue to the west.

description: a restless wind blows across the plain. it sends a chill across your skin.
investigationDescription: Tei seems uncomfortable this close to the forest. the memory of being cornered by a beast still seems to haunt them. they will not go to the east, where the forest lies.
